channel.title: 'For Those That Know' podmix
channel.description:
WAYNE DUBBLY / DJ PHING
Whether its Breaks, Dubstep, D&B or Freestyle Funk, DJ Phing appears to have just the phing for you
utilizing many genres and techniques a varied collection of good quality mixes
if you like what you hear become a fan :)
subscribe through itunes (its FREE!!) scroll down and hit the subscribe button easy as that :)
send to friends
comments greatly appreciated friend requests welcome
email waynedubbly@podomatic.com
peace and love + PG Tips
http://themixtrain.wordpress.com/imtc-players/jay-innit/

item.title: dubs n breaks n dnb xmas mix - wayne dubbly/dj phing
item.description: 3in1 mix of Dubstep, breaks and drum and bass featuring :- silent night - dj phing (dub breaks mashup bootleg) winter wonderland - wayne dubbly (dubstep mashup bootleg) frosty the snowman - dj phing (wooyeah breaks mashup bootleg) winter wonderland - dj phing (tribal/ D'n'B mashup bootleg) happy christmas to all friends and followers :)

item.itunes:summary:

item.description: dubstep, drumstep + drum and bass 1st half mixed by wayne , 2nd half by phing , was supposed to be 5 tunes each but mr.phing can't count and dropped 6 ;) wayne: 1. steptoe - calibre 2. tension - mark system 3. imperium - trackhead 4. majic fountain - art vs science 5. zombies - figure phing: 6. militant - harvest 7. die hard - dubversion 8. refugee - wilkinson 9. im for real - dramatic 10.dive - blockhe4d + cabbie 11.is anybody there - bcee + spy
item.dc:creator: Wayne dubbly - dj phing
item.itunes:summary:
dubstep, drumstep + drum and bass
1st half mixed by wayne , 2nd half by phing , was supposed to be 5 tunes each but mr.phing can't count and dropped 6 ;)
wayne:
1. steptoe - calibre 2. tension - mark system 3. imperium - trackhead 4. majic fountain - art vs science 5. zombies - figure
phing:
6. militant - harvest 7. die hard - dubversion 8. refugee - wilkinson 9. im for real - dramatic 10.dive - blockhe4d + cabbie 11.is anybody there - bcee + spy

item.title: bass racey
item.description: dubstep / drumstep with a bit of pace a little mix i recorded for 'The Tramp in the Shed' show on Vectis radio to be aired 1st march 2011 7pm - 11 pm tracklist:- 1. Bassnectar - boombox 2. Skream - sandsnake 3. Kannamix - cosmos 4. The bloody beetroots - warp 5. Butch clancey - russian lullaby 6. Diesel - brrrap 7. D*minds - T-10 8. Flux pavillion - bass cannon 9. Traxione - brush fire

item.itunes:summary:
dubstep / drumstep with a bit of pace

item.title: D'n'B surprises
item.description:
a mix taking elements from the full spectrum of dnb
tracklisting:-
1. r cola - sound (feat. jimmy riley) 2. deekline+ed solo vs system - dont smoke (bootleg) 3. d-jahsta - steppin wild 4. nero - elecktron 5. sigma - the jungle 6. krafty kuts - shake them hips (drumsound+bassline smith rmx) 7. byob - save my life (majik+wickerman inst.) 8. tiesto - kaleidoscope (high contrast mix) 9. deoder - fuk u 10. netsky - memory lane 11. fiction - crisis control 12. underworld - scribble
item.dc:creator: Wayne dubbly - dj phing
item.itunes:summary:
a mix taking elements from the full spectrum of dnb
tracklisting:-
1. r cola - sound (feat. jimmy riley) 2. deekline+ed solo vs system - dont smoke (bootleg) 3. d-jahsta - steppin wild 4. nero - elecktron 5. sigma - the jungle 6. krafty kuts - shake them hips (drumsound+bassline smith rmx) 7. byob - save my life (majik+wickerman inst.) 8. tiesto - kaleidoscope (high contrast mix) 9. deoder - fuk u 10. netsky - memory lane 11. fiction - crisis control 12. underworld - scribble

item.title: The Loonyparty
item.description: Breaks ,loops and samples mash up a slight detour this week ... ;) but hey, variety is the spice of life :D repackaged, re-edited remix of a set i done a few years ago big shoutout to all my new friends from around the world, thanks for all your support bad ass bass comming your way soon ;)
item.dc:creator: Wayne dubbly - dj phing
item.itunes:summary:
Breaks ,loops and samples mash up
a slight detour this week ... ;)
but hey, variety is the spice of life :D
repackaged, re-edited remix of a set i done a few years ago
big shoutout to all my new friends from around the world, thanks for all your support
bad ass bass comming your way soon ;)

item.title: Wayne Dubbly - Bass is the best drug

item.itunes:summary:
Dubstep / grime
watch out for your eardrums some heavy subs on a few of the tracks ;)

many thanks for tunning in
back soon with some drum'n'bass
